trans-unit.source: Specifies how an image is positioned within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> 내에 이미지가 놓이는 방식을 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>.
trans-unit.target: 이 열거형의 멤버를 사용 하 여의 값을 설정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode%2A> property.
To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializePictureBoxAndButton` method from the form's constructor or Load-event handling method.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제를 실행 하려면 Windows Form과 호출에 다음 코드를 붙여넣습니다는 `InitializePictureBoxAndButton` 폼의 생성자 나 로드 이벤트 처리 메서드는 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> is sized equal to the size of the image that it contains.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />의 크기는 포함되는 이미지의 크기와 동일하게 조정됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The image is displayed in the center if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> is larger than the image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />가 이미지보다 크면 이미지는 가운데에 표시됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the image is larger than the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />, the picture is placed in the center of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> and the outside edges are clipped.
trans-unit.target: 이미지가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />보다 크면 그림은 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />의 가운데에 표시되고 외부 가장자리가 클리핑됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The image is placed in the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 이미지는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />의 왼쪽 위 모퉁이에 놓입니다.

trans-unit.source: The image is clipped if it is larger than the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> it is contained in.
The image within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> is stretched or shrunk to fit the size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> 내의 이미지가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />의 크기에 맞게 늘어나거나 줄어듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The size of the image is increased or decreased maintaining the size ratio.
trans-unit.target: 크기 비율이 유지되도록 이미지 크기가 확대 또는 축소됩니다.
